snippet.title: Melbourne tram stabber still on the loose
snippet.content: Investigators are still searching for a man who stabbed two Melbourne tram passengers. The pair in their 20s needed hospital treatment after last Friday's stabbing on a Footscray tram and detectives are seeking a man of African appearance who at the time wore a dark overcoat, beanie and scarf. Three days after the incident officers arrested a 56-year-old man in connection with the stabbing but he has since been released without charge. Originally published as
